awards.title: Premi Recerca Jove per fomentar l'esperit científic del jovent (PRJ 2021)
awards.description: Award for the research work 'Senile Dementia: A growing challenge of our time', which includes the creation of a mobile application prototype for dementia detection.

awards.title: Hackathon Giravolt Crea Lab Award
